org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.http.websocketx
Class WebSocket13FrameEncoder

java.lang.Object
  org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.oneone.OneToOneEncoder
      org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.http.websocketx.WebSocket08FrameEncoder
          org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.http.websocketx.WebSocket13FrameEncoder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChannelDownstreamHandler, ChannelHandler
public class WebSocket13FrameEncoder
extends WebSocket08FrameEncoder

Encodes a web socket frame into wire protocol version 13 format. V13 is essentially the same as V8.

Parameters:
maskPayload - Web socket clients must set this to true to mask payload. Server implementations must set this to false.
